headline: Lowe's Unveils 2025 Total Home Strategy to Drive Long-Term Growth and Market Share
summary: Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) is hosting its 2024 Analyst and Investor Conference today to provide an update on its key growth and productivity initiatives and near-term and long-term financial targets. A live video webcast will be available on ir.lowes.com beginning at 8 a.m. Eastern time.
